ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I　ｗｏｕｌｄ　ｌｏｖｅ　ｔｏ　ｒｅｃｏｍｍｅｎｄ　ｔｈｉｓ　ｃｏｕｒｃｅ　ｔｏ　ｏｔｈｅｒｓ　ｓｉｎｃｅ　ｔｈｉｓ　ｉｓ　ｏｎｅ　ｏｆ　ｔｈｅ　ｂｅｓｔ　ｃｏｕｒｓｅｓ　I　ｈａｖｅ　ｅｖｅｒ　ｈａｄ．

I would recomment this course for a basic coverage of optics and its applications which is what the course advertized. It wasn't very useful in my research but it gave me an ok background. The course did have a feel of an undergrad survey course of where optics can be applied not so much a graduate course on how to apply optics to your research.
I would recommend APHYS 675 as a nice overview of optics.
If someone is in optics research, they should take this class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Tｈｉｓ　ｃｏｕｒｓｅ　ｉｓ　ｖｅｒｙ　ｈｅｌｐｆｕｌ　ｔｏ　ｄｅｅｐｅｎ　ｍｙ　ｋｎｏｗｌｅｄｇｅ　ｏｆ　ｍｙ　ｄｉｓｃｉｐｌｉｎｅ．

I learned a few new phenomenon in optics and understood a few things better. It was a good course to see where optics is applied now and what research in this broad field is up to. It also reinforced many of the things I learned in undergradIt was a good course overall and I definitely appreciated it. Thanks!
